Monday.Name: Take garbage and recycling out
Monday.Description: Check the small cans as well.

Monday.Name: Pickup dirty clothes
Monday.Description: Only time clothes should be on the floor is for... never mind.

Monday.Name: Pickup junk in the Bedroom
Monday.Description: The gremlins have spread our stuff everywhere.

Monday.Name: Pickup Dog Toys in the Bedroom
Monday.Description: The gerblin has spread his stuff everywhere, assert dominance by cleaning it up.

Tuesday.Name: Put dishes away
Tuesday.Description: Run the dishwasher, put the drying rack away, and make a round for dishes left out.

Tuesday.Name: Pickup Petroom floor
Tuesday.Description: Get those gerblin toys as well.

Tuesday.Name: Clean cat litter boxes
Tuesday.Description: I know, just hold your breath and pray.

Tuesday.Name: Fresh Petroom water
Tuesday.Description: The apartment is full of HydroHomies, fresh water is the simplest path to compliance.

Tuesday.Name: Pickup Leo's Desk
Tuesday.Description: The gremlins have spread our stuff everywhere.

Wednesday.Name: Take garbage and recycling out
Wednesday.Description: Check the small cans as well.

Wednesday.Name: Do the laundry
Wednesday.Description: Check the hampers to see if there's any that are full.

Wednesday.Name: Fold the laundry
Wednesday.Description: The sooner you get it in drawers the better you will feel about life.

Wednesday.Name: Fold the blankets
Wednesday.Description: The must return to the ladder for recharging once a week.

Wednesday.Name: Vacuum Living Room and Hallway thing
Wednesday.Description: Arlo will one day conquer sucky boi.

Wednesday.Name: Pickup dog toys
Wednesday.Description: There is likely a trail of destruction leading away from the toy basket. Good luck.

Thursday.Name: Clean and clear Kitchen counters
Thursday.Description: If it doesn't have a home on the counter it's gotta move.

Thursday.Name: Run the dishwasher
Thursday.Description: If a load has been brewing for a while just run it.

Thursday.Name: Clear the Kitchen table off
Thursday.Description: George should have no desire to go up there now.

Thursday.Name: Pick up dog toys in the Kitchen
Fresh water for Arlo
Thursday.Description: The apartment is full of HydroHomies, fresh water is the simplest path to compliance.

Thursday.Name: Sweep and mop the kitchen floors

Friday.Name: Put dishes away
Friday.Description: Run the dishwasher, put the drying rack away, and make a round for dishes left out.

Saturday.Name: Clean Norbert's Cage
Saturday.Description: Vacuum the cage, clean the litter box, and give him fresh water.

Saturday.Name: Wipe down the counter and sink
Saturday.Description: The sink should no longer taste like mint.

Saturday.Name: Wipe down the toilet
Saturday.Description: Clean the bowl, wipe off the dust.

Saturday.Name: Vacuum or sweep the floors
Saturday.Description: Get those hairballs out of the corners

Sunday.Name: Do the laundry
Sunday.Description: Check the hampers to see if there's any that are full. Rotate towels and sheets and get the old ones washed.

Sunday.Name: Fold the laundry
Sunday.Description: The sooner you get it in drawers the better you will feel about life.

Everyday.Name: Arlo's Drops
Everyday.Description: Give Arlo allergy drops twice a day.
